name: Lightdash
description: Explore and visualise metrics from your dbt cloud project

GITHUB_REPO.description: Name of the github repo containing your dbt project, e.g. 'my-org/dbtproject'

PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Personal access token for your github account. See https://docs.github.com/en/github/authenticating-to-github/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token

GITHUB_BRANCH.description: Branch in your github repo that Lightdash should sync to. e.g. 'main' or 'dev'

PROJECT_SUB_PATH.description: Location of your dbt project in the github repo. Only needed if you use a sub-folder for dbt.

PROFILES_SUB_PATH.description: Location of your dbt profiles folder in the github repo. Only needed if your profiles.yml is in a sub folder of the repo.

LIGHTDASH_SECRET.description: Unique secret for your heroku deployment to secure user logins
